publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1633 Brian Adam: Booking Fees for Arts and Leisure Activities—That the Parliament condemns the widespread introduction of booking fees for arts and leisure activities.
S1M-1633 Brian Adam: Booking Fees for Arts and Leisure Activities—That the Parliament condemns the widespread introduction of booking fees for arts and leisure activities.
S1M-1633 Booking Fees for Arts and Leisure Activities (lodged on 6 February 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Shona Robison*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-1633 Booking Fees for Arts and Leisure Activities (lodged on 6 February 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
